name: Equal and Opposite
description:
Stranded in space without working rocket engines, you must use your plasma cannon both to shoot asteroids and move around.

You can also play here: http://andrew-parker.me/EqualAndOpposite/

This is the result of my first game jam! I worked alone over a period of 45 hours. Created using Craftyjs.

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2017: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam
